mapper.sql: t_mark_seekcar.id as markSeekcarId, t_mark_seekcar.user_id as markSeekcarUserId, t_mark_seekcar.project_id as markSeekcarProjectId, t_mark_seekcar.start_city as markSeekcarStartCity, t_mark_seekcar.start_addr as markSeekcarStartAddr, t_mark_seekcar.end_city as markSeekcarEndCity, t_mark_seekcar.end_addr as markSeekcarEndAddr, t_mark_seekcar.start_time as markSeekcarStartTime, t_mark_seekcar.name as markSeekcarName, t_mark_seekcar.phone as markSeekcarPhone, t_mark_seekcar.memo as markSeekcarMemo, t_mark_seekcar.version as markSeekcarVersion, t_mark_seekcar.create_time as markSeekcarCreateTime, t_mark_seekcar.update_time as markSeekcarUpdateTime, t_mark_seekcar.is_active as markSeekcarIsActive, t_user_detail.nickname as userDetailNickname, t_user_detail.headicon as userDetailHeadicon
mapper.select:
select
from t_mark_seekcar, t_user_detail where t_mark_seekcar.id = #{id} and t_mark_seekcar.user_id = t_user_detail.id

select
from t_mark_seekcar, t_user_detail where t_mark_seekcar.user_id = t_user_detail.id order by t_mark_seekcar.update_time desc, t_mark_seekcar.create_time desc

select
from t_mark_seekcar, t_user_detail
order by
${query.sortColumn} ${query.sortOrder}
t_mark_seekcar.update_time desc, t_mark_seekcar.create_time desc
